std::list<std::string> dirRecursiveGet ( const char *  tdir,
const char *  pat 
)

Recursively gets a list of all files in a specific directory and all subdirectories, with the given patterm

  • dir The directory to search in, not neccesary with a slash at the beginning
  • pat The extension to answer to, ex. "png"
    Returns:
    A list of all filenames associated with the given suffix

double read_double ( PACKFILE *  fp  ) 

File: file.h

Description: Header file for miscellaneous file related functions

(c)2009, by Raymond Loeberg

Reads a double float from a packfile. Reads first a 1-byte length integer, then a string of that length

Returns:
A direct conversion of the loaded string
